name: Mission Smile

address: India Power Building, Plot No. X-1,2&3

briefDescription: Mission Smile (Formerly known as Operation Smile India)- is a medical charity dedicated to provide free life changing cleft care and surgeries to children born with Cleft lip, Cleft palate and other facial deformities. Since our inception in 2002, we have screened more than 35,000 cleft affected children and have performed more than 27,000 safe corrective surgeries in India.
